title: Love Me Always
description:
It’s all in the name of love…
Get lost in more than twenty African American romances filled with passion, desire, and love. This collection includes short reads ranging from sweet to sensual, to dark and addicting. These dirty alphas and sassy heroines will keep you up until long past your bedtime. Believe us, there is something for everyone in this anthology. Don’t delay. This collection of tales will only be available for a short time. One-click now!Note: This collection contains material for mature readers (18+ and older) only.The publisher’s proceeds from Love Me Always will be donated in their entirety to the NAACP Legal Defense Fund.
